summary:
Basically What Breeze but with twist, to access it use the eye of magnus in Breezehome as a portal or doorway to the mirror home.
===========================================================================================
You dont need to worry you dont need Dawnguard, or Dragonborn for this mod so enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
Basically What Breeze but with twist, to access it use the eye of magnus in Breezehome as a portal or doorway to the mirror home.

===========================================================================================
You dont need to worry you dont need Dawnguard, or Dragonborn for this mod so enjoy. 

Version 1. 
Added in Mannequins 
Staff Enchanter 
Added a Skyforge 
Added a Grindstone 
Added a Enchanter 
Potion Of Blood (For Vampires, From Dawnguard DLC) 
Added in the Ashman War Axe (From Dragonborn DLC) 
Being Able to temper the Ashman War Axe 
Added in a back room called Wardrobe (Has about 18 mannequins in it) 
Added the Heart Stone need to craft the staff's from the Staff enchanter 
Brighter than most of the images 

=========================================================================== 

V.2. 
I added in a Merchant to the mirror home: she has basic blacksmith items plus a numerous 
daedric weapons for sale

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

Need ideas for if the heart stone's should be crafted a the forge or something... 

=========================================================================== 

Need some more ideas, for example if this mod does get enough subscibers how
about person follower who knows.

==========================================================================

Link to my steam copy: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=193091984
author: Duck
